subject: Climate & Environment
title: Citizen Science and Biodiversity
description: A micro-lesson that makes Citizen Science and Biodiversity usable.

hook.text: You don't need a PhD to help save species. A smartphone and curiosity are enough.

buildup.text: Apps like iNaturalist let anyone photograph and identify plants and animals anywhere.

discovery.text: Citizen scientists have collectively logged over 200 million observations of species worldwide.

twist.text: Their data has led to the discovery of new species and tracking of population declines.
